description:
Spend more time sipping, and less time gazing sadly at the bottom of an empty cup. With 6 cups of dark magic for your next off-the-grid adventure, this will prevent your caffeine levels from plummeting to dangerously low levels.

  • 6 individual servings of full-bodied Awakening Blend, with earthy notes of dark cocoa and berry
  • Pocket PourOver™ delivers fresh coffee in moments
  • Steady-Safe™ anchor system attaches to most mugs
  • Nitro-Flush™ techn keeps coffee fresh for up to 12 months
  • Small batch-roasted coffee comes from a family farm in Thailand that employs people rescued from the sex trade, and pays above fair-trade wages
name: Kuju Coffee PourOver Bold Awakening Blend - 6 Pack
